---
title: "Some generic utilities"
---



-  `VectorAlignments.jl`: see the current [documentation on github](https://neelsmith.github.io/VectorAlignments.jl/stable/)
- `Obsidian.jl`: a Julia package for working with [Obsidian](https://obsidian.md) "vaults"
- [`Lectionary.jl`](http://neelsmith.quarto.pub/lectionary): a Julia package for coordinating the liturgical calendar year with the Gregorian civil calendar and with the readings from the Revised Common Lectionary (RCL).
- `Parashah.jl`: a Julia package for coordinating readings of the Parashat HaShavua with the representation of the Hebrew calendar implemented in `Calendars.jl` (preliminary work, not yet published on juliahub).
